Description

Shipping & Delivery

Percy From Thomas & Friends with DCC Sound and Moving Eyes

Features include:

DCC sound-equipped

dual-mode decoder for DCC or analog operation

whistle, chuff, and cylinder blow down

DCC and/or manual volume control with on/off switch

polarity switch for operation according to NMRA or Large Scale model railroading practices

additional character sound suites available through DCC CV selection only. Character sound suites include Thomas, Percy, James, Edward, Henry, Gordon, Emily, Spencer, and Toby. Whistle or bell per prototype.

moving eyes

international-style hook and loop couplers

Model: 91422

Shipping Weight: 7lbs

Scale: Large – Runs on 45mm Track

Recommended for ages 8 years old & up.

Our shipping times are typically 24-48hrs from ordering during normal business hours.

We use a Courier and Australia post as our agents. Please allow typical delivery times for your area.

International shipping is priced per country, please check your cart before ordering.

We are unable to ship Dangerous goods overseas.

We are also limited by length of some parcels. Anything over 1.05m will need a specialist courier quote which we can provide.

When adding items to your cart you can get a quote for shipping first before commiting to the order.
